english: This fundamental principle of litigants paying for their own risk of litigation has been well accepted and practised
chinese: 诉讼人承担本身诉讼风险的基本原则，获得广泛接受及执行。

english: Such litigants often face laws that are ambiguous , courts that rule inconsistently and patchy enforcement of rulings
chinese: 然而，这些诉讼人常常遇到法律规定模糊、法庭判决不一致和裁决执行不利等问题。

english: Judges or masters be given power to refer unrepresented litigants in civil cases for dla to waive financial eligibility limit
